Jian

Korean: 지안

5'6" (166 cm)

Group (2021-present):
LIGHTSUM until Oct 25, 2022

Introduction

Jian is a South Korean rapper and singer under Cube Entertainment. She made her official debut on June 10, 2021, as the maknae, rapper, and sub-vocalist of the girl group Lightsum.

On October 25, 2022, Cube announced that LIGHTSUM would continue as a six-member group following the departure of her and Huiyeon. Following her departure from LIGHTSUM, Jian shared a handwritten letter to her fans.

Although she is not active as an idol anymore, she is sometimes active on her socials.

Fun facts

1
When she was in 3rd grade of elementary school, Jian wanted a cellphone badly so she took the one her mom didn't use and pretended to make calls, even if it was out of service.
…
2
Whenever the practice room is empty, Jian sings alone holding a microphone.

Jian can make friends easily.

Jian's favourite flower is the rose.

Jian said she looks up at (G)I-DLE's Soyeon.

When she was asked what kind of artist she wants to be, Jian said she wants to be a singer and make people pleased.

7
Jian learned Taekwondo for 2 years when she was in kindergarten.
…
8
When Jian was little she was very bright and active, and during lunch time, instead of sitting while chatting, she went outside and played the policeman and robbers with her friends.
…
9
On Doljabi (a significant traditional Korean ceremony marking a child's first birthday), Jian spent her money on buying a  microphone.
